checkDuplicates(CrypterVerfahren, String) - Static method in class de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.crypter.KeyCorrectness
checks the key if it contains any duplicates
checkLength(CrypterVerfahren, String) - Static method in class de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.crypter.KeyCorrectness
checks the length of given key and compares it with minimum/maximum length addicted to the encode/decode method on use

method to check the length of given message.

createCrypter(CrypterVerfahren) - Static method in class de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.crypters.CrypterFactory
The method createCrypter(de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.crypter.CrypterVerfahren) can instantiate new crypther instances depending on the wished method
Crypter - Interface in de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.crypter
Grundlegendes Interface, um Verschlüsselung durchzuführen.
CrypterFactory - Class in de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.crypters
Factory class to create a coder with implemented methods: Caesar, Substitution and XOR.
CrypterVerfahren - Enum in de.wagnst.tpe.exercise.crypter
Enum which contains all possible crypters like xor, caesar and substition.
